channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: As much as I don’t want Facebook (aka Meta) to dominate the post-twitter market, they have the best product. That’s not saying a lot. There’s big room for improvement that’s been there for many years.
item.source:markdown: As much as I don’t want Facebook (aka Meta) to dominate the post-twitter market, they have the best product. That’s not saying a lot. There’s big room for improvement that’s been there for many years.

item.description: Hundreds of code libraries posted to NPM try to install malware on dev machines.
item.source:markdown: Hundreds of code libraries posted to NPM try to install malware on dev machines.

item.description: Perplexity CEO offers to replace striking NYT staff with AI.
item.source:markdown: Perplexity CEO offers to replace striking NYT staff with AI.

item.description: Why GM is ditching Apple CarPlay, with software boss Baris Cetinok.
item.source:markdown: Why GM is ditching Apple CarPlay, with software boss Baris Cetinok.

item.description: I don't like being labeled as liberal or leftist. If I were a conservative who believed in the rule of law I would be equally appalled at the NYT coverage of this election. Our constitutional house is on fire, and our supposed leading news org treats this as a normal election. That's the problem.
item.source:markdown: I don't like being labeled as liberal or leftist. If I were a conservative who believed in the rule of law I would be equally appalled at the NYT coverage of this election. Our constitutional house is on fire, and our supposed leading news org treats this as a normal election. That's the problem.

item.description: Quincy Jones, music titan who worked with everyone from Frank Sinatra to Michael Jackson, dies at 91.
item.source:markdown: Quincy Jones, music titan who worked with everyone from Frank Sinatra to Michael Jackson, dies at 91.

item.description: This could be the last gasp of the world we used to call twitter.
item.source:markdown: This could be the last gasp of the world we used to call twitter.

item.description: Perplexity launches an elections tracker.
item.source:markdown: Perplexity launches an elections tracker.

item.description: I’m watching season 2 of The Diplomat on Netflix. what a waste of good actors. the writing is insipid and the story thin. one of those shows where they play this super dramatic music while nothing is happening plot wise. its even more stupid than election coverage at The NY Times. watching Steve Kornacki on msnbc is far more entertaining.
item.source:markdown: I’m watching season 2 of The Diplomat on Netflix. what a waste of good actors. the writing is insipid and the story thin. one of those shows where they play this super dramatic music while nothing is happening plot wise. its even more stupid than election coverage at The NY Times. watching Steve Kornacki on msnbc is far more entertaining.

item.description: What happened in Iowa. Their 6-week abortion ban. So maybe red states with hard abortion bans might swing like Iowa may have.
item.source:markdown: What happened in Iowa. Their 6-week abortion ban. So maybe red states with hard abortion bans might swing like Iowa may have.

item.description: For one survivor, the 1920 Election Day massacre in Florida was ‘the night the devil got loose.’

item.description: TechCrunch: Bluesky raises $15M Series A, plans to launch subscriptions. No mention of the company's valuation unless I missed it.
item.source:markdown: TechCrunch: Bluesky raises $15M Series A, plans to launch subscriptions. No mention of the company's valuation unless I missed it.

item.description: Bluesky raised $15 million last month, but the press release doesn't say at what evaluation and if the founders sold stock in this round.
item.source:markdown: Bluesky raised $15 million last month, but the press release doesn't say at what evaluation and if the founders sold stock in this round.

item.description: I agree with Cory Doctorow on Bluesky. I've been saying the same thing, more politely, for a while. Maybe they'll listen, or maybe their business model is to sell their user base, as Twitter did.
item.source:markdown: I agree with Cory Doctorow on Bluesky. I've been saying the same thing, more politely, for a while. Maybe they'll listen, or maybe their business model is to sell their user base, as Twitter did.

item.description: Government should work quietly, making things better for the people and that's all, and until there's a crisis that demands our attention, stays out of the way.
item.source:markdown: Government should work quietly, making things better for the people and that's all, and until there's a crisis that demands our attention, stays out of the way.

item.description: "Trump is leading the country off a cliff and the only one with a parachute is Trump." Must-read.
item.source:markdown: "Trump is leading the country off a cliff and the only one with a parachute is Trump." Must-read.

item.description: Rising Trump-style populism threatens democracy but can be beaten. (Did the Post find a way to run their Harris endorsement after all?)

item.description: What explains the big gender gap between supporters of Trump and Harris?

item.description: Most Americans have only ever lived in a world where democracy was secure, where democracy was assumed. On Tuesday, we’ll decide if we want to stay in that world or leave it behind.
item.source:markdown: Most Americans have only ever lived in a world where democracy was secure, where democracy was assumed. On Tuesday, we’ll decide if we want to stay in that world or leave it behind.

item.description: So "richest man in the world" doesn't begin to cover Musk's ambition. He wants "all the money in the world."
item.source:markdown: So "richest man in the world" doesn't begin to cover Musk's ambition. He wants "all the money in the world."

item.description: When we vote we are governing, not expressing ourselves or protesting. It's not just the first amendment, it's the whole thing.
item.source:markdown: When we vote we are governing, not expressing ourselves or protesting. It's not just the first amendment, it's the whole thing.

item.description: Of course twitter is the best political weapon. I had that story in 2017. It was obvious then. No one listened.
